meanings.definition: To cook by dry heat in an oven.
meanings.sent1: I will bake cookies for the party.
meanings.sent2: She likes to bake bread on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The sun will bake the clay hard in no time.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to bake her heart with sadness.
meanings.sent5: The desert sun can bake the sand until it's like hot coals.

meanings.definition: To harden or dry by heat.
meanings.sent1: The sun will bake the mud bricks to make them strong.
meanings.sent2: The potter needs to bake the clay to make the vase firm.
meanings.sent3: The hot oven will bake the wet paint on the walls.
meanings.sent4: The summer heat can bake the ground until it cracks.
meanings.sent5: The fire will bake the clay pots until they are ready for use.

meanings.definition: To be cooked by dry heat.
meanings.sent1: The cake will bake in the oven for an hour.
meanings.sent2: The pie needs to bake at 350 degrees.
meanings.sent3: The cookies will bake perfectly if you follow the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The bread will bake until it's golden brown and crusty.
meanings.sent5: The pizza will bake quickly in the hot brick oven.
